name: Among the Stars (itch) (HuckCG)
description:
Among the Stars

This game is my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020. Fly through the rings to jump to another galaxy!

Special thanks to:

Athomitron and Alexia for giving me helpful art tips

Sid, the input system master

Bentobro, the intern :)

And of course, the Unity Asset Store and its content creators.

Controls:

Left Joystick or WASD to move

A/X button on Gamepad, or Space on keyboard to boost

Escape or Start Button to access the menu. You have to use the mouse to select one of the options.
